title: Carolina Stadium Getting A New Name
text:
Carolina Stadium Getting A New Name Tools 
Story Created: Oct 16, 2015 at 4:20   16, 2015 at 4:20 PM EDT COLUMBIA, S.C. (WOLO) -- USC confirmed Friday Carolina Stadium is getting a new name.Thursday, The State Newspaper reported USC and Founders Federal Credit Union had agreed to a deal to rename Gamecock baseball's home field Founders Park.According to the report, it's a 10-year deal for $4.5 million dollars.An official announcement is scheduled for Thursday at noon.
